languages.text: "Действовать. Амарнат определил проблему стагнации, но не решился на свершение перемен. Их свершу я. Один". {n}Дерзкая бодрость Паскаля отразилась и в движении мехадендритов, обретших грацию хищных змей.{/n}

"Act. Amarnat pinpointed the problem of stagnation but never mustered the courage to effect change. I will effect it. Alone." {n}Pasqal's bold vigour is reflected in the movements of his mechadendrites, which have taken on the gracefulness of snakes of prey.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Действовать. Амарнат определил проблему стагнации, но не решился на свершение перемен. Их свершу я. Один". {n}Дерзкая бодрость Паскаля отразилась и в движении мехадендритов, обретших грацию хищных змей.{/n}

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我打算行动。阿玛纳特指出了停滞不前的问题，但他从来都没能鼓起勇气，带来变革。我会让这一切化为现实，靠我自己的力量。”{n}帕斯卡的勇气与活力反映在他机械触须的动作上，机械触须优雅游动，如掠夺性的蛇群。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Act. Amarnat pinpointed the problem of stagnation but never mustered the courage to effect change. I will effect it. Alone." {n}Pasqal's bold vigour is reflected in the movements of his mechadendrites, which have taken on the gracefulness of snakes of prey.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我打算行动。阿玛纳特指出了停滞不前的问题，但他从来都没能鼓起勇气，带来变革。我会让这一切化为现实，靠我自己的力量。”{n}帕斯卡的勇气与活力反映在他机械触须的动作上，机械触须像蛇一样，优雅地游动着。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Actuar. Amarnat señaló el problema del estancamiento, pero nunca llegó tener valor como para forzar el cambio. Yo lo impondré. En solitario». {n}El audaz vigor de Pasqal se refleja en el movimiento de sus mecadendritas, que adoptan la gracilidad de serpientes en busca de presa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Act. Amarnat pinpointed the problem of stagnation but never mustered the courage to effect change. I will effect it. Alone." {n}Pasqal's bold vigour is reflected in the movements of his mechadendrites, which have taken on the gracefulness of snakes of prey.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Actuar. Amarnat señaló el problema del estancamiento, pero nunca llegó tener valor como para forzar el cambio. Yo lo impondré. En solitario». {n}El audaz vigor de Pasqal se refleja en el movimiento de sus mecadendritas, que adoptan la gracilidad de serpientes en busca de presa.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「行動。アマルナトは停滞の問題を的確に指摘していたが、変化をもたらす勇気を持つことはなかった。自分が変える。独りきりで」{n} パスカルの大胆な活力は、獲物を狙う蛇のように優雅な機械触手の動きにあらわれていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Act. Amarnat pinpointed the problem of stagnation but never mustered the courage to effect change. I will effect it. Alone." {n}Pasqal's bold vigour is reflected in the movements of his mechadendrites, which have taken on the gracefulness of snakes of prey.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「行動。アマルナトは停滞の問題を的確に指摘していたが、変化をもたらす勇気を持つことはなかった。自分が変える。独りきりで」{n} パスカルの大胆な活力は、獲物を狙う蛇のように優雅な機械触手の動きにあらわれていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Handeln. Amarnat hat das Problem der Stagnation erkannt und benannt, jedoch nie den Mut aufgebracht, einen Wandel herbeizuführen. Ich werde ihn herbeiführen. Allein." {n}Pasqals kühne Kraft spiegelt sich in den Bewegungen seiner Mechadendriten, welche die Anmut räuberischer Schlangen angenommen haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Act. Amarnat pinpointed the problem of stagnation but never mustered the courage to effect change. I will effect it. Alone." {n}Pasqal's bold vigour is reflected in the movements of his mechadendrites, which have taken on the gracefulness of snakes of prey.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Handeln. Amarnat hat das Problem der Stagnation erkannt und benannt, jedoch nie den Mut aufgebracht, einen Wandel herbeizuführen. Ich werde ihn herbeiführen. Allein." {n}Pasqals kühne Kraft spiegelt sich in den Bewegungen seiner Mechadendriten, welche die Anmut räuberischer Schlangen angenommen haben.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Agir. Amarnat a mis en avant le problème de la stagnation, mais sans jamais trouver le courage d'y remédier. C'est ce que je compte faire. Seul. » {n}La vigueur intrépide de Pasqal est visible dans les mouvements de ses mécadendrites, qui ont adopté la grâce de serpents prédateurs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Act. Amarnat pinpointed the problem of stagnation but never mustered the courage to effect change. I will effect it. Alone." {n}Pasqal's bold vigour is reflected in the movements of his mechadendrites, which have taken on the gracefulness of snakes of prey.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Agir. Amarnat a mis en avant le problème de la stagnation, mais sans jamais trouver le courage d'y remédier. C'est ce que je compte faire. Seul. » {n}La vigueur intrépide de Pasqal est visible dans les mouvements de ses mécadendrites, qui ont adopté la grâce de serpents prédateurs.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Act. Amarnat pinpointed the problem of stagnation but never mustered the courage to effect change. I will effect it. Alone." {n}Pasqal's bold vigour is reflected in the movements of his mechadendrites, which have taken on the gracefulness of snakes of prey.{/n}

languages.text: "Eyleme geçeceğim. Amarnat, duraksama sorununa parmak bassa da değişim meydana getirebilecek cesareti hiçbir zaman gösteremedi. Ben göstereceğim. Bir başıma." {n}Pasqal'ın iddialı coşkusu, av peşindeki yılanların zarafetini andıran mekadentritlerinin hareketine de yansıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Act. Amarnat pinpointed the problem of stagnation but never mustered the courage to effect change. I will effect it. Alone." {n}Pasqal's bold vigour is reflected in the movements of his mechadendrites, which have taken on the gracefulness of snakes of prey.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eyleme geçeceğim. Amarnat duraksama sorununa parmak bastı ancak değişim meydana getirebilecek cesareti hiçbir zaman gösteremedi. Bunu ben yapacağım. Kendi başıma." {n}Pasqal'ın iddialı coşkusu, mekadentritlerinin hareketine de yansıyor ve av peşindeki yılanların zarafetini andırıyorlar.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
